Achivements.Requirement: Achieved the “Age of the Stars” ending
Defeated Astel, Naturalborn of the Void
Used kindling to set the Erdtree aflame
Upgraded any armament to its highest stage
Restored the power of a Great Rune
Acquired all legendary sorceries and incantations
Achieved the “Lord of the Frenzied Flame” ending
Defeated Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree
Defeated Shardbearer Maliketh the Black Blade
Defeated the Red Wolf of Radagon

Achivements.Achievement Name: Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon
Achivements.Requirement: Defeated Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon

Legendary Armaments.Name: Marais Executioner's Sword
Legendary Armaments.Description: Reward for clearing Shaded Castle boss fight against Elemer.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Eclipse Shotel
Legendary Armaments.Description: Found in Castle Sol. From the Chuch of the Eclipse Site of Grace, it is just around the corner in the church at the altar.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Sword of Night and Flame
Legendary Armaments.Description: From the Manor Lower Level Site of Grace in Caria Manor you want to run outside and run on the castle walls. Just before you reach the third tower jump to the lower building on your left and from there drop once again to a building with a ladder heading inside the building from the roof. There inside a chest you will find it.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Devourer's Scepter
Legendary Armaments.Description: Dropped by the NPC “Bernahl” at Warmaster's Shack when killed. He will leave later in the game. If you missed him here you can instead find him in Volcano Manor and help him with his quest until he disappears. He will later appear in Farum, down the ladder from Beside the Great Bridge Site of Grace as a phantom and you can kill him there for the Devourer's Scepter.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Golden Order Greatsword
Legendary Armaments.Description: Reward for clearing Cave of the Forlorn, south of the Minor Erdree in the area leading to Haligtree.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Ruins Greatsword
Legendary Armaments.Description: After Radahn is defeated head back to the Redmane Castle. Talk to the announcer in the Church until he leaves. Refresh at Site of grace and defeat the boss duo in the plaza.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Bolt of Gransax
Legendary Armaments.Description: From the Erdtree Sanctuary site of grace, go out the west door where there is an elevator you can take to the lower level. Follow the path down, then jump over the railing on the left to where the giant golden spear is sticking out of the wall. Climb a short distance up the spear to find this weapon. THIS IS MISSABLE – The Royal Capital gets destroyed at the end of the game and then the weapon is gone for this playthrough, but if you have a friend with the weapon you can have it dropped to you in co-op.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Dark Moon Greatsword
Legendary Armaments.Description: Reward for securing the Age of the Stars Ending. After the final talk with Renna it will appear where she was. See Elden Ring How to Get All Endings.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Lhutel the Headless
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Found in Tomsword Catacombs west of the Minor Erdtree in Weeping Peninsula.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Black Knife Tiche
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Reward for Ringleader's Evergaol in the northwest corner of Moonlight Plateau.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Redmane Knight Ogha
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Finish War-Dead Catacombs in the north of Radahn boss fight arena.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Mimic Tear
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Chest in Night's Sacred Ground behind Stonesword Key Gate. From Ancestral Woods Site of Grace in Siofra River jump to the black building. Follow the ledges and roofs until you get into a cathedral-looking building with an altar. Find the chest at the end of the hallway past the altar.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Found in Sainted Hero's Grave west of Leyndell, the Royal Capital.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Cleanrot Knight Finlay
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: From the Prayer Room Site of Grace in Elphael, go straight after you teleport there. Go down the first set of stairs and jump the balcony to the pavilion with candles around it. There enter the room and you will find it in a chest.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Flame of the Fell God
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Reward for clearing Malefactor Evergaol in south Liurnia.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Founding Rain of Stars
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Found in Heretical Rise in the east Mountaintop of the Giants. You will have to cross an invisible bridge starting from the other side of the canyon by following barely visible mist showing you the path.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Elden Stars
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Found in Deeproot Depths in a cave full of gigantic Ants. You can reach the cave by following the roots. In the cave you will find it at the exit past all the big ants.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Ranni's Dark Moon
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Found in Chelona's Rise on the Moonlight Altar Plateau – you will have to interact with the book and kill 3 white turtles to open the seal. You will reach this area while working towards the Age of the Stars Ending. The first turtle is to the right of the chapel hanging on the wall of the cliff. Number 2 and 3 are problematic because they sometimes refuse to spawn. If number 2 doesn't spawn for you head to number 3 instead for whom you will have to simply use the wind stream with your mount. Don't teleport, just ride there. Also the other way around – if number 3 isn't there, check number 2 instead. The sealed Rise opens after killing 2 turtles (1+2 or 1+3), it seems a big glitchy.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Comet Azur
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Mt. Gelmir, Primeval Sorcerer Azur Site of Grace – get if from the Sorcerer there.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Stars of Ruin
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Sellen Questline – find corpse of her master in Mt. Gelmir, (Comet Azur location – see Sorcery #5 in this list) talk to her and she will give you a key to the seal in a hidden cave south – find the hidden cave southwest of Fort Faroth, find the spell there. In order to find the cave you will have to hit an illusory wall! Sellen herself can be found in Waypoint Cellar Ruins.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Greyoll's Roar
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Kill Greyoll and buy it with Dragon Hearts at the Cathedral of the Dragon Communion. Greyoll is the big dragon close to Fort Faroth. You have to kill the 5 smaller dragons surrounding him and afterward Greyoll will be one hit away from death. Aggro the dragons one by one starting behind Greyoll.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Radagon Icon
Legendary Talismans.Description: Can be found in Academy of Raya Lucaria. From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, head straight to get outside. Then immediately turn right, go around the corner and jump to the balcony. Take the ladder up and on the big balcony you can find it in a chest.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Radagon's Soreseal
Legendary Talismans.Description: Can be found in Fort Faroth. When entering the Fort you will see it behind the wooden wall. Use the ladder to get to the roof and drop into the last hole there. Navigate through the catwalk to get it.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Godfrey Icon
Legendary Talismans.Description: Reward for clearing the Golden Lineage Evergaol in the south of Altus Plateau / Southwest from the Capital.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Moon of Nokstella
Legendary Talismans.Description: In a chest under the giant throne at the highest section in the west of Nokstella.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
Legendary Talismans.Description: In Elphael starting from the Drainage Channel Site of Grace, run on the roots and jump through the hole in the roof into the chappel. There on the balcony you will find it in a chest.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Marika's Soreseal
Legendary Talismans.Description: In Elphael starting from the Prayer Room Site of Grace go outside and keep dropping down until you reach the bottom area. There you can find a gate you have to open with a Stonesword Key. Inside you will find it at an altar.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Old Lord's Talisman
Legendary Talismans.Description: In Farum from Beside the Great Bridge Site of Grace instead of following the Bridge towards the boss, head in the other direction and find it in a chest at the end.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Erdtree's Favor +2
Legendary Talismans.Description: This Talisman can only be obtained after the Capital becomes a desert (endgame). From the Forbidden Lands east of the capital, head back towards the capital, take the elevator down and you will find it on a dead tree.

Millicent.Name: Step 1
Millicent.Description: Speak with Gowry in his shack and he will ask for a favor. He wants help to heal a young girl, Millicent, found beyond Sellia, who has the Scarlot Rot. To do this he will ask you to seek an Unalloyed Gold Needle dropped by Commander O'Neil located in the deep scarlet Swamp of Aeonia, outside Sellia's bounds. In return, he will share the secrets of the town of Sellia.

Millicent.Name: Step 2
Millicent.Description: You will need to fetch the Unalloyed Gold Needle and return it to him. After returning to him, he'll tell you he'll need some time to repair the needle and will give you Sellia's Secret.

Millicent.Name: Step 3
Millicent.Description: Warp to a nearby point or quit game then reload and return and he'll give you the repaired needle.

Millicent.Name: Step 4
Millicent.Description:
Bring the needle to Millicent at the Church of the Plague.
  • Light the beacons in Sellia, according to the secret Gowry gave you, in order to open the way to the church.

Millicent.Name: Step 5
Millicent.Description: After Millicent uses the needle, reload the game and exhaust her dialogue. She will gift you the Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom.

Millicent.Name: Step 6
Millicent.Description: Speak with Gowry at his shack and he will offer to sell you sorceries.

Millicent.Name: Step 7
Millicent.Description: Reload the area and return to his shack to speak with Millicent, where she will announce she is going on a journey.

Millicent.Name: Step 8
Millicent.Description: Millicent now will be located just north of the Erdtree-Gazing Hill Grace in Altus Plateau. The player can give her the Valkyrie's Prosthesis item to advance her quest line after exhausting her dialogue.

Millicent.Name: Step 9
Millicent.Description: After defeating the boss of Dominula, Windmill Village she will be near the Windmill Heights Grace after reload. Exhaust her dialogue to continue the quest.

Millicent.Name: Step 10
Millicent.Description: Millicent will move to the Ancient Snow Valley Ruins Grace at Mountaintop of the Giants.

Millicent.Name: Step 11
Millicent.Description: Millicent will next be available at the Prayer Room Grace at Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. She will not move from this spot until the player has defeated a Ulcerated Tree Spirit mini-boss just before the Drainage Channel Grace.

Millicent.Name: Step 12
Millicent.Description: Once the player has defeated the mini-boss and rested/traveled at a Grace, there will a summon sign on the mini boss arena that allows the player to be summoned to her world and help fight 4 difficult NPC invaders known as Millicent’s Sisters granting you the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia upon completion.

Millicent.Name: Step 13
Millicent.Description: Once completed the player can reset the area again and she will be nearby where her summoning sign was. Interact and exhaust her dialogue for the last time as upon one more rest she will be dead in the same spot and her corpse can be looted for the Unalloyed Gold Needle, which can be used at Malena’s flower to receive Miquella’s Needle. Be careful however, if you land on her, she will die and will not drop the Needle, and will instead drop Millicent's Prosthesis.

Dung Eater.Name: Step 1
Dung Eater.Description: After showing the Dung Eater at least one Seedbed Curse, he will give you the Sewer-Gaol Key. This can be used to access the sewers undernath Leyndell via a well, leading to the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

Dung Eater.Name: Step 2
Dung Eater.Description:
The Dung Eater can be found in the newly-unlocked sewers and released from his prison by talking to him.
  • Spawn at the Underground Roadside grace
    • Leave this room and take a left
    • Now head down the corridor and jump down the open grate
    • Run North and go past the giant poison plants and climb the ladder
    • Be wary of the giant hand in this room, behind it is the Gaol door with Dung Eater inside
    • Do not kill Dung Eater here if you want to complete his questline
      • Dung Eater in his cell

Dung Eater.Name: Step 3
Dung Eater.Description:
Upon returning to Roundtable Hold, the Dung Eater will be missing, having left a message asking you to fight him at the outer moat. Map Link.
  • Make sure you complete Blackguard Big Boggart's questline before moving onto the next step otherwise, Big won't get murdered by Dung Eater and drop a Seedbed Curse. 
  • Dung Eater in the Outer Moat

Dung Eater.Name: Step 4
Dung Eater.Description: Upon defeating the Dung Eater at the moat he will return to Roundtable Hold. Talk to him and he will ask you to bring his real body more Seedbed Curses. His body can be found tied up in a chair in the same room that he was rescued from. You may interact with him to give Seedbed Curses to him.

Dung Eater.Name: Step 5
Dung Eater.Description:
After giving the Dung Eater 5 Seedbed Curses, his questline will be complete and you will be rewarded the Mending Rune of the Fell Curse.
  • Reload the area and travel back to find the Omen Set where he gave you the rune.

Sorceress Sellen.Name: Step 1
Sorceress Sellen.Description: You can meet her first at the Waypoint Ruins though it's only a spectral body. She will introduce herself as the Graven Witch. Should you accept to study under her teaching, you'll be able to pursue her quest. Learning some new sorceries will unlock more dialogues with her but that's all so far.

Sorceress Sellen.Name: Step 2
Sorceress Sellen.Description: After progressing, you'll find Azur, an old Glinstone sorcerer, out the back of Hermit Village that will gives you a sorcery Comet Azur. Go back to Sellen to unlock the next part of her quest.

Sorceress Sellen.Name: Step 3
Sorceress Sellen.Description: Sellen will ask you to find another sorcerer locked away in the Sellia Hideaway in Caelid, behind an arcane ward in the second pit. You can locate the pit by finding a snail on a crystal.

Sorceress Sellen.Name: Step 4
Sorceress Sellen.Description: Return to Sellen after defeating Starscourge Radahn. She will request that you meet her in person at the Witchbane Ruins where she will give you Sellen's Primal Glintstone.

Sorceress Sellen.Name: Step 5
Sorceress Sellen.Description:
Journey to the Three Sisters to some ruins between Ranni's Rise and Renna's Rise. You will find the ruins have an illusory floor.

  • In here, there is an illusory wall in the basement next to a sign that says "Don't Touch". On the other side is Sellen's body you can give the Primal Glintstone to.

Sorceress Sellen.Name: Step 6
Sorceress Sellen.Description:
Return to Sellen in Witchbane Ruins to find Witch Hunter Jerren (If Jerren is not there, you will need to go back to Redmane Castle and exhaust his dialogue).  Exhaust his dialogue here and then fast travel to Raya Lucaria Grand Library grace. Take the exit to find two summon signs.
  • If you summon to assist Sellen:
    • Defeating Jerren will reward you the Eccentric Set.
    • Exhaust Sellen's dialog to receive the Glintstone Kris, and have Shard Spiral added to her shop. If you did the step to find Lusat then you can reload the area by resting to see her transformation. Next to her will be the Witch's Glintstone Crown. Rennala will be back in her original place as well.
    • Sellen will stay in the Grand Library in place of Rennala until you have found Lusat. Once found, return to Sellen, exhaust her dialog, then reload the area for Sellen to transform and for Rennala to return.
    • After Sellen's transformation, you can re-visit the bodies of Azur and Lusat to receive the Azur's Glintstone Set and Lusat's set, respectively. 
  • If you summon to challenge Sellen:
    • Defeating Sellen will reward you the Witch's Glintstone Crown and Sellen's Bell Bearing.
    • Jerren gives you an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone.

Sorcerer Rogier.Name: Step 1
Sorcerer Rogier.Description: Rogier can first be found in Stormveil Castle by the altar of the Chapel in the northwest section [Map Link]

Sorcerer Rogier.Name: Step 2
Sorcerer Rogier.Description: After defeating Godrick he will move to Roundtable Hold, on the balcony that overlooks the entrance hall. (Note: Rogier will die if you speak to Ranni at the three sisters in the North West of Liurnia before finishing this questline.)

Sorcerer Rogier.Name: Step 3
Sorcerer Rogier.Description: Under Stormveil Castle, starting from the Liftside Grace, exit out the door to the courtyard, turn right, double back, approach the ledge that has a corpse sitting and looking down. Jump down to the buttresses below and again to the wooden scaffolding and onto the ground. Defeat the Root Monster and continue on to find what looks to be an ancient, rotting face. Just in front of the face is a bloodstain. Activate it to view a memory of Rogier's death.

Sorcerer Rogier.Name: Step 4
Sorcerer Rogier.Description: Return to the Roundtable and ask Rogier about the face. He will explain that it is the face of Godwyn the Golden, who was the first demi-god to be killed in the event leading up to the shattering of the Elden Ring and that he was killed with a certain black knife.

Sorcerer Rogier.Name: Step 5
Sorcerer Rogier.Description: Talk to Fia and allow her to hold the Tarnished. Exhaust the dialogue options along the lines of "Talk in secret", "Did you know?" and "About the Black Knifeprint" to get the location of a dungeon where a Black Knife Glyph can be found. This dungeon can be found at the North East corner of Liurnia, and within you must ride the descending blades up to find a secret path that ends with an secret wall leading to a boss.

Sorcerer Rogier.Name: Step 6
Sorcerer Rogier.Description: Return the Black Knife Glyph to Rogier. On reloading the area he will send you looking for Ranni, who can be found at the three sisters in the North West of Liurnia.

Sorcerer Rogier.Name: Step 7
Sorcerer Rogier.Description: Upon talking to Ranni she effectively tells the player to leave. Notifying Rogier of this development results in Rogier recommending the player become one of Ranni's Vassals to get more information from her. Rogier sends the player back to talk to Ranni again.

Sorcerer Rogier.Name: Step 8
Sorcerer Rogier.Description: Ranni will now allow the player to become one of her vassals and begin her questline. Returning to Rogier results in him warning the player that he is worried he will fall into a deep slumber - he is on the brink. Resting at the site of grace will in fact show that now he has fallen into the slumber he spoke of.

Sorcerer Rogier.Name: Step 9
Sorcerer Rogier.Description: Some time after this, he will die, leaving his set and a letter, revealing the existence of D's younger brother and his whereabouts. His body and chair will mysteriously disappear on a subsequent visit.

D. Hunter of the Dead.Name: Step 1
D. Hunter of the Dead.Description: D, Hunter of the Dead is first found in Stormhill, Limgrave, to the east of Stormhill Shack. Here, he will warn the player of "those who live in death", referring to the undead infestation of Summonwater Village. He can also be found in Roundtable Hold on your first visit [unknown reason why]

D. Hunter of the Dead.Name: Step 2
D. Hunter of the Dead.Description: Players should go to Summonwater Village and defeat the Tibia Mariner boss there, then return to D at the Rountable Hold to continue his quest. He will give you directions to go to the Bestial Sanctum in Caelid. You can teleport there without having to explore by going to the "Sending Gate" in East Limgrave (Map Link).

D. Hunter of the Dead.Name: Step 3
D. Hunter of the Dead.Description: Will become available as a merchant once player has visited Gurranq. Player can return to Roundtable Hold and speak to D who will give them a dialogue option, selecting yes will allow the player to purchase D's incantations.

D. Hunter of the Dead.Name: Step 4
D. Hunter of the Dead.Description: D can be summoned to help you fight the Black Knife Assassin in Black Knife Catacombs.

Iron Fist Alexander.Name: Step 1
Iron Fist Alexander.Description: Alexander can be found in Northern Stormhill, West to the river and North of the Agheel Lake North Site of Grace. [Elden Ring Map here]

Iron Fist Alexander.Name: Step 2
Iron Fist Alexander.Description: He can next be found in Gael Tunnel. This tunnel is in the border, between Caelid and Limgrave. He can be found past a door, and once he is talked to he expresses his desire to move on to Redmane Castle. Elden Ring Map here

Iron Fist Alexander.Name: Step 3
Iron Fist Alexander.Description: Talk to him again at Redmane Castle, he will talk about his excitement about the incoming encounter with Radahn. Elden Ring Map Here.

Iron Fist Alexander.Name: Step 4
Iron Fist Alexander.Description: He can then be summoned for the boss fight against Starscourge Radahn. If he has not been interacted with prior to this, he will show up at the festival anyway and introduce himself. Before moving to his next location, he can be found scavenging at Starscourge Radahn's Site of Grace.[Elden Ring Map Link]

Iron Fist Alexander.Name: Step 5
Iron Fist Alexander.Description: Found in Liurnia of the Lakes, just south of Carian Study Hall. Follow the path south from the Artist's Shack Site of Grace. Alexander will call out for help as the player gets closer to his location. He will ask you to make him "slippery". Use an Oil Pot to free him. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Iron Fist Alexander.Name: Step 6
Iron Fist Alexander.Description: Found near the Seethewater Terminus Site of Grace at a lava lake south of Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir. Alexander is sitting in the lake behind a Magma Wyrm. Alexander can be spoken to from the safety of the rock in the lava lake. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Iron Fist Alexander.Name: Step 7
Iron Fist Alexander.Description: Can be summoned for the boss fight against Fire Giant. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Iron Fist Alexander.Name: Step 8
Iron Fist Alexander.Description: Found in Crumbling Farum Azula, on a path upwards after the Dragon Temple Altar Site of Grace, past a fog wall that requires a Stonesword Key. Go up the elevator now available and past the Dragon Temple Lift Site of Grace. Travel towards the dragon located on the right and kill it. Reload the area and travel back to where the dragon was. [Elden Ring Map Link] He will challenge you to a warrior's duel, resulting in his honorable death, rewarding Alexander's Innards and Shard of Alexander.

Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Name: Step 1
Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Description:
Bloody Finger Hunter Yura can initially be found under an overpass directly northeast of Seaside Ruins (Grace) in southern Limgrave. He will warn the Tarnished not to explore Agheel Lake because of the danger of a dragon.
  • If the player ventures to the lake anyways, and kills the dragon, Yura will congratulate the player and inform them of the location of Church of Dragon Communion, where they can use the heart of the dragon.
  • It is not necessary to talk to Yura here, or to kill the dragon, to advance the quest.

Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Name: Step 2
Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Description:
Upon approaching Murkwater Cave, the player will be invaded by Bloody Finger Nerijus. After defeating the invader with Yura's help, Yura can be found under a different overpass further north of Murkwater Cave, close to the Murkwater Coast Grace, where he will explain about his task of hunting down Bloody Fingers. Map Link
  • If Yura dies in the fight against Nerijus, he will stay dead and the quest will end.

Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Name: Step 3
Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Description:
Yura may be found in Raya Lucaria, requesting aid from the player in the form of a Red Summon Sign on the bridge north of the Main Gate Grace. Walk past the magic seal to find. Enter his world and defeat Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin. Afterward, talk to Yura who will be standing against the railing near to where his summon sign was. He will explain that he is hunting the dangerous Bloody Finger Eleonara. Map Link.
  • If Yura or the player dies during this fight, Yura will not die and the player can try again.

Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Name: Step 4
Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Description:
Yura may be found at the Second Church of Marika on the Altus Plateau. Talking to him will reward the Nagakiba and lead to a battle with Bloody Finger Eleonora. [Elden Ring Map here]

  • Winning this fight will reward Purifying Crystal Tear, Eleonora's Poleblade, and one Furlcalling Finger Remedy

Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Name: Step 5
Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Description: Yura, who has had his body taken over by Shabriri, can be found at Zamor Ruins Grace. Shabriri will attempt to convince the player to take the path of the Frenzied Flame. The player can optionally attack him, where winning his fight will reward the Ronin's Set.

Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Name: Step 6
Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.Description: If the player doesn't complete Yura's quest prior to being possessed by Shabriri, they can still acquire all items. Bloody Finger Eleonora will still invade at the Second Church of Marika. Killing Eleonora will reward Purifying Crystal Tear, Eleonora's Poleblade, and one Furcalling Finger Remedy. The Nagakiba can be found at the last location the player spoke with Yura prior to being possessed, or at Yura's camp north-west of the Seaside Ruins grace.

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 1
Ranni the Witch.Description: Ranni is first encountered as Renna at the Church of Elleh at the beginning of the game. Map Link

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 2
Ranni the Witch.Description: If Ranni's first encounter is missed for whatever reason, she will be found Liurnia at the top of Ranni's Rise after defeating Royal Knight Loretta

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 3
Ranni the Witch.Description: If the initial encounter is missed, she will no longer give the Spirit Calling Bell but it can be bought it from the Twin Maiden Husks.

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 4
Ranni the Witch.Description:
Ranni is later found in Liurnia atop Ranni's Rise at Night. She recruits the player on a quest to find the hidden treasure of Nokron and asks that you speak with three people in her service: War Counselor Iji, Blaidd and Seluvis. These three will then appear in spectral form on the first floor of her tower.
  • The player cannot leave the tower area until all three people are spoken to and their dialog exhausted.  Following that Ranni will have a final dialog set and once that is completed the player can resume normal travel and fast travel. 
  • If you only get a dialog about her curse with "The curse mark you seek is not here, now begone." and she won't recruit you, you need to go back to Rogier, who will suggest you join her to learn more about it. You can then come back to her and continue her quest

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 5
Ranni the Witch.Description: Blaidd will be waiting in the Siofra River area, and will reveal that he suspects that Preceptor Seluvis knows more than he lets on. Seluvis will inform you that Sorceress Sellen has some information, and provide you with Seluvis's Introduction. Sellen then informs the player that  Starscourge Radahn stopped the stars, and that defeating him is the key to Nokron's secrets.

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 6
Ranni the Witch.Description:
Once Radahn is defeated the stars will be freed, with one falling south of Mistwood, creating another entrance to Nokron. Through this the player can reach Night's Sacred Ground and collect the Fingerslayer Blade, the secret treasure of Nokron.
  • If Ranni was missed at the beginning of the game, she can be found in her tower after defeating Radahn

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 7
Ranni the Witch.Description: Returning the Fingerslayer Blade to Ranni will lead to her revealing that she needs the blade to continue on her 'dark path'. She will reward the player with the Carian Inverted Statue, which they can use at  the Carian Study Hall to reach the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia. Upon arriving they will be able to find the Cursemark of Death upon Ranni's body, confirming that her body was killed along with Godwyn's soul.

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 8
Ranni the Witch.Description: Renna's Rise will be open, and using the waygate at the top will allow the player to reach Ainsel River Main, which houses the Miniature Ranni.  Talking to the doll at a site of grace on the river will lead Ranni to confirm that the doll houses her soul, and she will give the player a task to defeat the Baleful Shadow.

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 9
Ranni the Witch.Description: Upon traveling to site of grace Nokstella Waterfall Basin in Nokstella, Eternal City and defeating the Baleful Shadow, Ranni will tell the player that she has been released and reward the Discarded Palace Key.

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 10
Ranni the Witch.Description: Using the key to unlock the chest in the Raya Lucaria Grand Library next to Rennala will give the player the Dark Moon Ring. With the ring, the player can travel back to the Lake of Rot in the Ainsel River area, continuing to the Grand Cloister.

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 11
Ranni the Witch.Description: Using the coffin in the Grand Cloister, the player can access and defeat Astel, Naturalborn of the Void.  This will allow the player to continue to the Moonlight Altar, past Glintstone Dragon Adula, and enter the Cathedral of Manus Celes. Ranni's body is located in a small cave in the cathedral in front of an instance of the Two Fingers, which Ranni has killed with the Fingerslayer Blade.

Ranni the Witch.Name: Step 12
Ranni the Witch.Description: Using the Dark Moon Ring on Ranni's body will reveal Ranni, now fully freed. She will confim that the player is now her consort, and promise them that they will meet again. She will reward the player with the Dark Moon Greatsword before disappearing. This will give the player the option of completing the "Age of the Stars" ending at the end of the game.

Fia.Name: Step 1
Fia.Description: Once you have defeated two Shardbearers and claimed their Great Runes, you can return to Fia to gain an additional line of dialogue during which she will hand you a broken dagger. Talking to D, Hunter of the Dead in the Roundtable Hold will allow you to give it to him, triggering the next part of the quest.

Fia.Name: Step 2
Fia.Description: Reloading the area after this part will trigger an event where you'll see Fia above D's corpse in a newly opened room near the blacksmith, after which she'll disappear. After which, you will need to head to the deepest part of Deeproot Depths, near Godwyn's corpse offshoot where she'll greet you with a boss fight. Which, after you won, let you speak to her. She'll ask you if you went all this way to kill her. Answering her that you want to be hugged will trigger the next step of her quest, asking you to find the Cursemark of Death, that you get while going through Ranni's quest.

Fia.Name: Step 3
Fia.Description: Bringing back the Cursemark of Death will nearly end her quest. After you give it to her and exhaust her dialog, upon reloading the area she'll be asleep at Godwyn's side. Inspecting her will let you enter Godwyn's dream to fight Lichdragon Fortissax.

Fia.Name: Step 4
Fia.Description: Winning this fight will allow you to pick up the Mending Rune of the Death-Prince which will allow you to obtain an alternate ending.

Fia.Name: Step 5
Fia.Description: After acquiring the rune, you can give the Twinned Armor set to D's brother (NPC sitting on the floor right before Valiant Gargoyle boss' grace site). He will appear standing by Fia's bloody corpse, claiming he killed her (although by this point in Fia's questline it's implied she already died producing the Mending Rune for you). You can then loot Fia's Set, and D's brother will leave behind the Twinned Set you gave him before upon reloading/returning to the area.

Irina.Name: Step 1
Irina.Description: Upon speaking to Irina, she will implore you to help deliver a letter, "Irina's Letter", to her father in Castle Morne, at the southern tip of the Weeping Peninsula.

Irina.Name: Step 2
Irina.Description:
After successfully delivering her letter to Edgar, he will lament that he is not able to go to Irina because of his ongoing duties at Castle Morne - he cannot allow the Grafted Blade Greatsword to be stolen by the Misbegotten.
  • If you kill the Leonine Misbegotten before talking to Edgar, Irina will be found dead at her original location next to an Iron Cleaver embedded in the ground.
  • Killing Edgar will also trigger her death.

Irina.Name: Step 3
Irina.Description: After defeating Leonine Misbegotten and retrieving the sword, Edgar will thank the player and return to Irina.

Irina.Name: Step 4
Irina.Description: Edgar  can then be found weeping over Irina's body, where he will vow revenge against the Misbegotten.

Irina.Name: Step 5
Irina.Description: If the player travels to the Revenger's Shack, Edgar will appear as a hostile invader in the form of Edgar the Revenger.

Patches.Name: Step 1
Patches.Description: Patches can be found at the end of Murkwater Cave, past the Highwayman bandits. You have to open the chest to trigger the fight. Elden Ring Map Here

Patches.Name: Step 2
Patches.Description: Patches will surrender after approximately a quarter to half of his health is left.

Patches.Name: Step 3
Patches.Description: If forgiven, Patches invites you to return and you can find him in his lair at Murkwater Cave. There is a new chest there, which you can ask him about. Opening the chest will reveal a trap set up by Patches, one which teleports you to Mistwood Ruins.

Patches.Name: Step 4
Patches.Description:
If forgiven, Patches will leave Murkwater Cave and set up camp at the Scenic Isle Site of Grace, which is a raised isle in the southern parts of Liurnia's swamp, north of Limgrave. Elden Ring Map Here.
  • If his bossfight is fought after visiting Volcano Manor he will skip this location and move straight to the manor.

Patches.Name: Step 5
Patches.Description: He can be found hiding between bushes at Mt.Gelmir close to the cliff west from the Fist Mt. Gelmir campfire site of grace. There he left a message on the ground as well as a trail of colorful placed Rainbow Stones to lure you to the edge of the cliff. When speaking with him, he just tells you that he's doing nothing suspicious at all. Upon following his trail of rainbow stones to the edge of the cliff, a cutscene will trigger in which Patches will push you down the cliff, saying that you'll never reach Volcano Manor. To be more precise about his location, go from the message (the message is right behind the pumpking enemy) to the first red glowing stone, then to the 2nd glowing stone. Jump down (but not the cliff!) in direction to the 3rd glowing stone and look southeast, patches should now be in view. Map Link

Patches.Name: Step 6
Patches.Description: You can then find Patches inside Volcano Manor, after leaving Scenic Isle Site of Grace.

Patches.Name: Step 7
Patches.Description:
When in Volcano Manor, Patches has a questline. After completing one assassination requests, you can speak to him to receive the Letter to Patches. When you return to him after assassinating the target, he will mention reporting to Tanith about the assignment. Come back to talk to him after a time-skip or reloading the area and he'll begrudgingly reward you with the Magma Whip Candlestick. [Elden Ring Map here]

Patches will leave Volcano Manor, after killing the area boss God-Devouring Serpent.

Patches.Name: Step 8
Patches.Description: If you decide to kill him instead his shop items won't be lost. You will receive his Bell Bearing which can be exchanged at the Roundtable Hold at the Twin Maiden Husks to unlock his shop there.

Blaidd.Name: Step 1
Blaidd.Description: Inside Mistwood, the player can occasionally hear a wolf howl. At this point, they can ask Merchant Kale about the howling. The merchant will teach the player the Finger Snap gesture.

Blaidd.Name: Step 2
Blaidd.Description: Blaidd can be seen resting on the tallest point in the Mistwood Ruins, and will jump down after the player uses the gesture while standing below him. Blaidd will tell the player he is searching for a man who goes by the name "Darriwil". [Map Link]

Blaidd.Name: Step 3
Blaidd.Description:
Darriwil can be fought at the Forlorn Hound Evergaol, where Blaidd will become available as a summon. Speak to Blaidd again after the fight.
  • Talking to Blaidd once will yield a Somber Smithing stone [2]. Talk to him a second time and he will mention a blacksmith along the Road to the Manor in Liurnia, and instruct the player to say that "Blaidd sent them". Doing this will unlock the Carian Filigreed Crest in the blacksmith's shop.
  • If the Evergaol fight was completed before meeting Blaidd, he will still be available to speak to here after the player talks to him in the Mistwood Ruins.
  • See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

Blaidd.Name: Step 4
Blaidd.Description:
Darriwil can be fought at the Forlorn Hound Evergaol, where Blaidd will become available as a summon. Speak to Blaidd again after the fight.
  • Talking to Blaidd once will yield a Somber Smithing stone [2]. Talk to him a second time and he will mention a blacksmith along the Road to the Manor in Liurnia, and instruct the player to say that "Blaidd sent them". Doing this will unlock the Carian Filigreed Crest in the blacksmith's shop.
  • If the Evergaol fight was completed before meeting Blaidd, he will still be available to speak to here after the player talks to him in the Mistwood Ruins.
  • See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

Blaidd.Name: Step 5
Blaidd.Description:
After meeting Ranni the Witch in Liurnia and taking on her quest, the player will need to meet Blaidd at Siofra River, which can be entered by taking the lift at the Siofra River Well in Mistwood. Blaidd will ask you to speak to Preceptor Seluvis, who in turn directs you to Sorceress Sellen. (Map Link)
  • Blaidd will be standing at the edge of a cliff near a wind jump-point for your mount. You can find him on the Interactive Map here.

Blaidd.Name: Step 6
Blaidd.Description: After speaking to Sellen, report back to Blaidd at Siofra River. He will request that you meet him at Redmane Castle to participate in a festival. Map Link

Blaidd.Name: Step 7
Blaidd.Description: Once the festival is completed, the player will need to meet Blaidd at Forlorn Hound Evergaol, he is trapped inside it. You can speak with Iji before or after freeing Blaidd, explaining why he placed him there.

Blaidd.Name: Step 8
Blaidd.Description: After completing Ranni's questline, return to Ranni's Rise where you'll find Blaidd outside at the entrance, hostile. Defeating him will grant you his greatsword and his armor set. *Confirmed, note that you need the FULL questline, which means after you get the Dark Moon Greatsword and not up to when you give her the Fingerslayer Blade.

Blaidd.Name: Step 9
Blaidd.Description: Blaidd will drop his full armor set and weapon.

Brother Corhyn.Name: Step 1
Brother Corhyn.Description: Brother Corhyn can be first met once the player is able to go to Roundtable Hold, he can be seen standing in the main room.

Brother Corhyn.Name: Step 2
Brother Corhyn.Description: After entering the Academy of Raya Lucaria, Brother Corhyn will tell you he is going on a journey to find the Goldmask. After resting, he moves to Altus Plateau and increases the number of Incantations he knows. Corhyn will be standing on the road north of the Altus Highway Junction waypoint, next to the monument where the Map (Altus Plateau) can be found. [Map link] If you find Corhyn dead at any point in the questline, you can still complete the steps with Goldmask.

Brother Corhyn.Name: Step 3
Brother Corhyn.Description:
On the north side of Altus Plateau, there is a large broken bridge. You can encounter Goldmask standing on the north section of the Forest-Spanning Great Bridge, south of East Windmill Pasture.
  • Traveling north of the Bower of Bounty grace, you can use a Spirit Spring near the bridge to jump directly up to the Goldmask.
  • Alternatively, use the waygate on the southern section of the Forest-Spanning Great Bridge, next to the Forest-Spanning Great Bridge Site of Grace.

Brother Corhyn.Name: Step 4
Brother Corhyn.Description: After speaking to the Goldmask, you can inform Corhyn of his location. After resting, Corhyn moves to stand next to the Goldmask and increases his stock again. You can discuss Goldmask with him.

Brother Corhyn.Name: Step 5
Brother Corhyn.Description: After obtaining at least two Great Runes and gaining access to Leyndell, Corhyn and Goldmask move to the city Leyndell, to be found on a cliff up near the colosseum and contemplating a riddle. From the Erdtree Sanctuary site of grace, head out of the western door, and use the tree branches to fall onto the walkway below leading to the colosseum. Exhaust Corhyn's dialog about Goldmask. Map Link

Brother Corhyn.Name: Step 6
Brother Corhyn.Description: The solution is found west of the Erdtree Sanctuary site of grace, down an elevator and a set of stairs. A white message on the ground facing the statue mentions "Regression". You must stand on the message, facing the statue, and cast the Law of Regression incantation to solve the riddle. Touch the new message that appears, and report the secret to Goldmask and then exhaust Corhyn's dialog.

Brother Corhyn.Name: Step 7
Brother Corhyn.Description: Upon reload, Goldmask and Corhyn will move to the bridge south of Stargazers' Ruins. [Map link]

Brother Corhyn.Name: Step 8
Brother Corhyn.Description: After defeating the Fire Giant and then the Beast Clergyman within Crumbling Farum Azula, Goldmask's corpse can be found in Leyndell, Ashen Capital on the bottom of the coliseum cliffs facing the west side of the Erdtree Sanctuary site of grace past several plant enemies. He will give you the Mending Rune of Perfect Order.

Brother Corhyn.Name: Step 9
Brother Corhyn.Description: Corhyn can be found in Leyndell, Capital of Ash after for a few lines of additional dialogue.
